name: Titanium.UI.Windows.Style
summary: Windows Style provides a flexible way to customize appearance of your apps using XAML representation.

methods.name: apply
methods.description: Provides a flexible way to customize appearance of your apps using XAML representation.

parameters.name: component
parameters.summary: A component object to change the theme appearance.

parameters.name: style
parameters.summary: A style name to change the appearance.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: XAML source to represent theme and styles for the component. Default source is ms-appx:///Styles.xaml.
